description: Imbyaro nyinshi no kubyara indahekana, byongera inkaruka mbi ku buzima bw’umubyeyi n’umwana.
title: Imbyaro nyinshi no kubyara indahekana, byongera inkaruka mbi ku buzima bw’umubyeyi n’umwana.
content: Imbyaro nyinshi no kubyara indahekana, byongera inkaruka mbi ku buzima bw’umubyeyi n’umwana. Umubiri w’umugore ushobora gucika intege ku buryo bworoshye iyo yatwite akanabyara inshuro nyinshi, yikurikiranya cyangwa se kwita ku bana bakiri bato. Nyuma yo gutwita inshuro nyinshi, ahorana ibibazo by’urudaca by’ubuzima nko kubura amaraso cyangwa se kuva.
